item.description:
Please join us for a fun morning of tennis. This is not intended to be a competitive event. ALL skill levels are welcome and you will not be required to play any formal games or matches. For those wanting competition, you will probably find someone willing and able. Just come equipped to play, bring water and make the best of it. There is also the possibility of organizing lunch afterwards.

I want to thank those who participated last Saturday. We had a nice turnout and it seemed like everyone had a pretty good time.

Conard High School is very easy to get to, especially off of I-84.

Rain cancels the event but the extended forecast looks good so far.

Feel free to contact me at 559-7983 with any questions or comments.

Hope to see you there. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture plus I'll be looking for you.
item.why: Why not plus it's free!!.....and, of course, Sandy is absolutely adamant that we're fun!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis
